user_users_info: To connect to the interface, users have to enter their ID{{customerCode}} and username separated by a "/", and their password.

user_users_enable_modal_step1_question: Are you sure you want to enable the following user: {{login}}?

user_users_disable_success_message: The following user has been disabled: {{login}}.
user_users_disable_error_message: An error has occurred when disabling the following user: {{login}}:
user_users_enable_error_message: An error has occurred when enabling the following user: {{login}}:
